name: Miracle Adventure of Esparks: Ushinawareta Seiseki Perivron
overview: Long before God even born, the Earth was formed by the law of nature. However, Dr. Gallipoli, which appeared from the dark world, scattered and dispersed his own monsters in various places as much as possible and began to conquer the world. One boy and one white monkey went on a journey to find a peaceful stone neutron to defeat Dr. Gallipoli.
